actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the United States House of Representatives on the importance of tax incentives for homeownership and that no additional restrictions or caps should be placed on homeownership tax benefits.

summary.text: Home Ownership Equity Resolution - Expresses the House of Representatives' recognition of the importance: (1) of tax incentives (such as the tax deductibility of mortgage interest) to homeownership; and (2) of not placing additional restrictions or caps on homeownership tax benefits.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the United States House of Representatives on the importance of tax incentives for homeownership and that no additional restrictions or caps should be placed on homeownership tax benefits.
